startLaunch.testBotMessage: Click 'Test Now' to launch the bot in test mode before launching. Once you are satisfied with the bot, you can launch your bot for your website

launched.botUniqueIdUse: When you configure the chatbot on your website, use the below bot unique id in the bot configuration.
